text: Hod HaSharon (, lit. "Splendor of the Sharon plain") is a city in the Central District in Israel. The city is about east of the Mediterranean coast, south of Kfar Saba, southeast of Raanana, and northeast of Ramat HaSharon. In 2022, 65,614 people lived there. == References == Category:Cities in Israel Category:Central District (Israel)
title: Hod HaSharon
